articles.author: Katie Shepherd
articles.title: West Virginia lawmakers pass abortion ban - The Washington Post
articles.description: State Republicans moved forward with the ban despite signs in other parts of the country that many American voters do not support the Supreme Court’s ruling.
articles.content:
The West Virginia legislature Tuesday passed a bill to prohibit nearly all abortions, making it the second state to pass a new ban since the Supreme Court reversed Roe v. Wade in June.
The state Sen… [+6279 chars]

articles.title: North American markets tumble, with U.S. stocks posting worst drop since June 2020 - CP24
articles.description: North American markets tumbled Tuesday after the latest reading on U.S. inflation disappointed traders, with Canada's main stock index down more than 300 points and all three major U.S. stock indexes seeing their worst day since June 2020.
articles.content: TORONTO - North American markets tumbled Tuesday after the latest reading on U.S. inflation disappointed traders, with Canada's main stock index down more than 300 points and all three major U.S. sto… [+797 chars]

articles.title: Chelsea chairman Todd Boehly calls for 'North vs South All-Star game' in the Premier League - Daily Mail
articles.description: The American has also called for a 'four-team tournament' to take place at the bottom of the table to decide who goes down at the end of the season rather than straight relegation for three teams.
articles.content:
Chelsea chairman Todd Boehly has suggested the Premier League should introduce an all-star North versus South game to help raise money for the English football pyramid.
